Chapter 4 Missing values 4.1 Load Dataset 4.2 Evaluating Missing Values 4.2.1 Defining a Function to Plot Missing Value Patterns: miss_pat() miss_pat takes in two values, (1) data: the dataframe of interest and (2) style: specifying ‘count’ or ‘percent’ as the style of graph you are interested in displaying. 4.2.2 Visualizing Missing Patterns Since our dataset it quite large (795, 590), we split up our visualizations per 100 columns, so patterns are still interpretable. However, the downside to this approach is that we lose sight of overarching patterns of missing data across all cases, what it does show is amongst a 100 column sample, which columns or attributes are most commonly missing. 4.2.3 Observations
